attributes.action: Please demolish Norwich Central Baptist Church
attributes.additional_details:
Every Sunday morning I am woken up by the terribly loud ringing of bells from Norwich Central Baptist Church.

Everybody deserves a lay in on Sundays yet I am forced to awake from my peaceful slumber by these bell ringers.

Please support my cause as I would rightfully like this Church demolished so I no longer need to be woken on Sunday mornings.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
